message: Hello? Finally!
Good morning, you're through to the DVLA. How can I assist you today?
It's about flipping time! I've been on hold for over 20 minutes!
I apologize for the long wait, sir. We've been experiencing higher than normal call volumes today.
Well that's no excuse, is it? You need to sort out your staffing issues.
You're absolutely right, the wait times are unacceptable. I sincerely apologize for the poor experience so far.
Apology accepted I suppose. I need to change the address on my driving license urgently.
Not a problem, let's get that sorted for you right away. Can I start by getting your full name please?
It's James Thompson.
Thank you, and your date of birth?
28th of May 1979.
Got it. And can you provide the license number from your current driving license?
Hang on...let me dig it out...
Okay, it's Tango, Hotel, Oscar, Mike...
Apologies sir, could you use the phonetic alphabet please? It helps reduce errors.
Fine...Tango, Hotel, Oscar, Mike, Yankee, Eight Seven Six, Five Four Three, Lima Bravo, Two Two, Delta X-ray.
Thank you, let me confirm that back - THOMY876543LB22DX?
Yes, that's correct.
Great, I have your details. What is the new address you need updated?
It's 27 Maple Grove, Leeds, LS16 7QR.
27 Maple Grove...and the postcode is LS16 7QR in Leeds, is that right?
Yes that's it, well done.
Thank you for confirming. One moment while I update your new Leeds address...
I've updated your new address on our system, Mr. Thompson.
It's about time. So that's me sorted then?
Not quite sir, since you've updated your address, we'll need to issue you a new driving license document with the Leeds details printed on it.
You're kidding me? More waiting around?
I can certainly understand your frustration after the long call wait. However, getting a replacement is simply required procedure when updating to a new address.
Alright fine, how much is this replacement going to cost me then?
There will be no charge, Mr. Thompson. Address changes are updated free of charge as long as your current license isn't lost or stolen.
Oh...well I suppose that's one bit of good news at least.
Yes, we'll print and mail you a new license with your Leeds address in the next 1-2 weeks, completely free of charge.
I guess I can live with that. Sorry for losing my temper earlier, this move has just been really stressful.
No need to apologize, I understand it's a hectic time. I'm just glad we could get everything sorted properly in the end.
Yeah, you've been very helpful. Thanks for your patience and for explaining it all clearly.
You're very welcome, Mr. Thompson. I appreciate your understanding as well. Is there anything else I can assist with today?
No that's everything, thanks again.
You're most welcome. Have a great rest of your day.
You too, bye.
